solution_line_template: She will spend {num_small_bulbs}*${cost_small_bulb}=$<<{num_small_bulbs}*{cost_small_bulb}={small_bulbs_total}>>{small_bulbs_total} on small light bulbs.
In total she will spend ${small_bulbs_total} + ${cost_large_bulb} = $<<{small_bulbs_total}+{cost_large_bulb}={total_spent}>>{total_spent} on the 4 light bulbs.
